item.description:
Our cells engage in protein production, and many of those proteins are enzymes responsible for the chemistry of life.
— Randy Schekman

— Bernard Katz

Progress in science depends on new techniques, new discoveries and new ideas, probably in that order.
— Sydney Brenner

What I cannot create, I do not understand.

item.title: Mass spectrometry
item.description:
Atoms are not indivisible, for negatively electrified particles can be torn from them by the action of electrical forces.
— Sir J.J. Thomson

item.title: Structure Biology
item.description: CroyEM system | Sample preparation 1. Methods to improve particle behavior Size exclusion chromatography: Gel filtration can be a powerful tool to predict structural heterogeneity. Whenever possible, gel filtration should be incorporated to the final steps of a purification protocol. Protein or protein complex stabilization: If negative stain or cryo-EM analysis reveals significant structural heterogeneity, then the user may consider additional methods to stabilize a structural target in a defined conformation.

item.title: Tissue clearing methods
item.description: Introduction This webinar will explain tissue clearing, how it functions, and the three main methods for making tissues transparent. Moreover, the advantages and limitations of various tissue cleansing methods. PEGASOS (Using in our lab, recommended): PEGASOS version 1ï¼šPolyethylene glycol(PEG) Associated Solvent System Jing, Dian, et al. “Tissue clearing of both hard and soft tissue organs with the PEGASOS method.” Cell research 28.8 (2018): 803-818. [PDF | DOI Link] TESOS system:

item.title: Genomics and Sequencing
item.description: RNA-Seq KITS FOR RNA EXTRACTION Takara: Smart-Seq SEQUENCING PLATFORM illumina; Huada Gene ANALYSIS SOFTWARES QC: fastqc: FastQC aims to provide a simple way to do some quality control checks on raw sequence data coming from high throughput sequencing pipelines. It provides a modular set of analyses which you can use to give a quick impression of whether your data has any problems of which you should be aware before doing any further analysis.

item.title: Microscopic Imaging
item.description:
Believing is seeing and seeing is believing.
— Tom Hanks

item.title: Programming & Coding
item.description: R R-The R Project for Statistical Computing: https://www.r-project.org/ Rstudio: Rstudio Workbench is an integrated development environment for R and Python, with a console, syntax-highlighting editor that supports direct code execution, and tools for plotting, history, debugging and workspace management. RShiny: Shiny is an R package that makes it easy to build interactive web apps straight from R. You can host standalone apps on a webpage or embed them in R Markdown documents or build dashboards.
